knimeNode.name: Model File Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes models as XML to file.

fullDescription.intro: This node saves any prediction model into a file. Connect the input port to a model output port of any prediction model generating node. Enter the destination location in the configuration dialog of the node. When executed, the node saves the incoming model as XML description in the specified file.

ports.predParamIn: The prediction model to write out.
